measurement_conditions: 95th percentile (p95) response time, excluding cold starts.
monitoring_tools: Firebase Performance Monitoring; Google Cloud Monitoring
improvement_opportunities: Optimize Firestore queries; Increase function memory.
business_relevance: Ensures a snappy and responsive user experience for backend interactions.

measurement_conditions: From app launch to first interactive screen on a mid-range device (e.g., Pixel 5).
improvement_opportunities: Lazy-load non-critical assets; Reduce main thread initialization work.
business_relevance: First impression of the app's performance and quality.

measurement_conditions: During scrolling of long lists and screen transitions.
improvement_opportunities: Optimize widget build methods; Use const constructors where possible.
business_relevance: Ensures a smooth, non-janky user experience.
